register.name: SCTLR
register.description: Provides control and configuration of: -memory alignment, endianness, protection, and fault behavior -MMU, cache enables, and cache replacement strategy -interrupts and behavior of interrupt latency -location for exception vectors -program flow prediction

bitField.name: TE
bitField.description: Thumb exception enable bit (banked).

bitField.name: AFE
bitField.description: This is the Access Flag Enable bit (banked).

bitField.name: TRE
bitField.description: This bit controls the TEX remap functionality in the MMU (banked).

bitField.name: NMFI
bitField.description: This is the Non-Maskable Fast Interrupt enable bit.

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: Determines the value of the CPSR E bit on an exception (banked).

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Determines the location of exception vectors (banked).

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Determines if instructions can be cached in any instruction cache at any cache level (banked).

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Enables program flow prediction (banked).

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Determines if data can be cached in a data or unified cache at any cache level (banked).

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Enables strict alignment of data to detect alignment faults in data accesses (banked).

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: Enables the MMU.

register.name: MIDR
register.description: Return the device ID code that contains information about the processor

bitField.name: Implementor
bitField.description: Indicates the implementor

bitField.name: Variant
bitField.description: Indicates the variant number, or major revision, of the processor

bitField.name: Architecture
bitField.description: Indicates whether the architecture is given in the feature registers

bitField.name: Primary_part_number
bitField.description: Indicates the part number

bitField.name: Revision
bitField.description: Indicates the revision number, or minor revision, of the processor

register.name: MPIDR
register.description: Indicates that the processor is a uniprocessor

register.name: ID_PFR0
register.description: Provide information about the execution state support and programmer's model for the processor

bitField.name: State3
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb Execution Environment (ThumbEE).

bitField.name: State2
bitField.description: Indicates support for Jazelle extension interface.

bitField.name: State1
bitField.description: Indicates the type of Thumb encoding that the processor supports.

bitField.name: State0
bitField.description: Indicates support for ARM instruction set.

register.name: ID_PFR1
register.description: Provides information about the execution state support and programmer model for the processor

bitField.name: Microcontroller_programmers_model
bitField.description: Indicates support for microcontroller programmer's model.

bitField.name: Security_extensions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Security Extensions Architecture v1.

bitField.name: Programmers_Model
bitField.description: Indicates support for standard ARMv4 programmer's model

register.name: ID_DFR0
register.description: Provides information about the debug system for the processor

bitField.name: Microcontroller_debug_model_memory_mapped
bitField.description: Indicates support for the microcontroller debug model - memory-mapped.

bitField.name: Trace_debug_model_memory_mapped
bitField.description: Indicates support for the trace debug model - memory-mapped.

bitField.name: Trace_debug_model_coprocessor_based
bitField.description: Indicates support for the coprocessor-based trace debug model - coprocessor.

bitField.name: Core_debug_model_memory_mapped
bitField.description: Indicates support for the memory-mapped debug model.

bitField.name: Secure_debug_model_coprocessor_based
bitField.description: Indicates support for the secure debug model - coprocessor.

bitField.name: Core_debug_model_coprocessor_based
bitField.description: Indicates support for the coprocessor debug model.

register.name: ID_AFR0
register.description: Provides additional information about the features of the processor

register.name: ID_MMFR0
register.description: Provide information about the memory model, memory management, cache support, and TLB operations

bitField.name: FCSE
bitField.description: Indicates support for fast context switch memory mappings.

bitField.name: Auxiliary_Control
bitField.description: Indicates support for Auxiliary Control Register.

bitField.name: TCM
bitField.description: Indicates support for TCM and associated DMA.

bitField.name: Outer_shareable
bitField.description: Indicates support for outer shareable attribute.

bitField.name: Cache_coherence
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache coherency maintenance.

bitField.name: PMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Protected Memory System Architecture (PMSA).

bitField.name: VMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Virtual Memory System Architecture (VMSA).

register.name: ID_MMFR1
register.description: Provide information about the memory model, memory management, cache support, and TLB operations

bitField.name: BTB
bitField.description: Indicates support for branch target buffer.

bitField.name: L1_test_clean_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for test and clean operations on data cache, Harvard or unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_unified_cache_maintenance_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, all maintenance operations, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Harvard_cache_maintenance_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, all maintenance operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: L1_unified_cache_line_maintenance_operations_by_set_and_way
bitField.gui_name: L1 unified cache line maintenance operations by set and way
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by set and way, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Harvard_cache_line_maintenance_operations_by_set_and_way
bitField.gui_name: L1 Harvard cache line maintenance operations by set and way
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by set and way, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: L1_unified_cache_line_maintenance_operations_by_MVA
bitField.gui_name: L1 unified cache line maintenance operations by MVA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by MVA, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Harvard_cache_line_maintenance_operations_by_MVA
bitField.gui_name: L1 Harvard cache line maintenance operations by MVA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by MVA, Harvard architecture.

register.name: ID_MMFR2
register.description: Provide information about the memory model, memory management, cache support, and TLB operations

bitField.name: Hardware_access_flag
bitField.description: Indicates support for hardware access flag.

bitField.name: WFI
bitField.description: Indicates support for wait-for-interrupt stalling.

bitField.name: Memory_barrier_features
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory barrier operations.

bitField.name: Unified_TLB_maintenance_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, unified architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_TLB_maintenance_operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_L1_cache_maintenance_range_operations
bitField.gui_name: Harvard L1 cache maintenance range operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache maintenance range operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_L1_background_prefetch_cache_range_operations
bitField.gui_name: Harvard L1 background prefetch cache range operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for background prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_L1_foreground_prefetch_cache_range_operations
bitField.gui_name: Harvard L1 foreground prefetch cache range operations
bitField.description: Indicates support for foreground prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture.

register.name: ID_MMFR3
register.description: Provide information about the memory model, memory management, cache support, and TLB operations

bitField.name: Supersection
bitField.description: Indicates support for supersections.

bitField.name: Branch_predictor_maintenance
bitField.description: Indicates support for branch predictor maintenance operations.

bitField.name: Hierarchical_cache_maintenance_operations_by_set_and_way
bitField.gui_name: Hierarchical cache maintenance operations by set and way
bitField.description: Indicates support for invalidate cache by set and way, clean by set and way, and invalidate and clean by set and way.

bitField.name: Hierarchical_cache_maintenance_operations_by_MVA
bitField.gui_name: Hierarchical cache maintenance operations by MVA
bitField.description: Indicates support for invalidate cache by MVA, clean by MVA, invalidate and clean by MVA, and invalidate all.

register.name: ID_ISAR0
register.description: Provide information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: Divide_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for divide instructions.

bitField.name: Debug_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for debug instructions.

bitField.name: Coprocessor_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor instructions. This field reads as zero (RAZ).

bitField.name: Compare_and_branch_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for combined compare and branch instructions.

bitField.name: Bitfield_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for bitfield instructions.

bitField.name: Bit_count_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for bit counting instructions.

bitField.name: Atomic_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for atomic load and store instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR1
register.description: Provide information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: Jazelle_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Jazelle instructions.

bitField.name: Interworking_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for instructions that branch between ARM and Thumb code.

bitField.name: Immediate_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for immediate instructions.

bitField.name: ITE_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for If-Then instructions.

bitField.name: Extend_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for sign or zero extend instructions.

bitField.name: Exception_2_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for exception 2 instructions.

bitField.name: Exception_1_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for exception 1 instructions.

bitField.name: Endian_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for endianness control instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR2
register.description: Provide information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: Reversal_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for reversal instructions.

bitField.name: PSR_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for PSR instructions.

bitField.name: Unsigned_multiply_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced unsigned multiply instructions.

bitField.name: Signed_multiply_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced signed multiply instructions.

bitField.name: Multiply_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for multiply instructions.

bitField.name: Interruptible_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for multi-access interruptible instructions.

bitField.name: Memory_hint_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory hint instructions.

bitField.name: Load_and_store_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for load and store instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR3
register.description: Provide information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: Thumb2_executable_environment_extension_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb2 Executable Environment Extension instructions.

bitField.name: NOP_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for true NOP instructions.

bitField.name: Thumb_copy_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb copy instructions.

bitField.name: Table_branch_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for table branch instructions.

bitField.name: Synchronization_primitive_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for synchronization primitive instructions.

bitField.name: SVC_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for SVC instructions.

bitField.name: SIMD_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Single Instruction Multiple Data (SIMD) instructions.

bitField.name: Saturate_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for saturate instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR4
register.description: Provide information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: Exclusive_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for exclusive instructions.

bitField.name: Barrier_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for barrier instructions.

bitField.name: SMC_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for SMC instructions.

bitField.name: Write_back_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for write-back instructions.

bitField.name: With_shift_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for with-shift instructions.

bitField.name: Unprivileged_instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Unprivileged instructions.

register.name: ID_ISAR5
register.description: Implementation specific

register.name: SILICON_ID
register.description: Identifies the silicon manufacturer and revision

bitField.name: Implementor
bitField.description: This field contains a code that identifies the silicon manufacturer. ARM assigns this code.

bitField.name: Feature
bitField.description: This field is implementation-defined.

bitField.name: Major_revision
bitField.description: This field is implementation-defined.

bitField.name: Minor_revision
bitField.description: This field is implementation-defined.

register.name: ACTLR
register.description: Auxiliary control processor-specific features that are not architecturally described

bitField.name: L2_hardware_reset_disable
bitField.description: Monitors the L2 hardware reset disable bit, L2RSTDISABLE

bitField.name: L1_hardware_reset_disable
bitField.description: Monitors the L1 hardware reset disable bit, L1RSTDISABLE

bitField.name: Cache_maintenance_pipeline
bitField.description: Specify pipelining of CP15 data cache maintenance operations

bitField.name: Clock_stop_request_disable
bitField.description: Disables Clock stop request

bitField.name: CP14_CP15_instruction_serialization
bitField.description: Imposes serialization on those CP14 and CP15 instructions that are not natively serialized

bitField.name: CP14_CP15_wait_on_idle
bitField.description: Imposes wait on idle protocol of CP14 and CP15 serialized instructions that do not natively wait on idle

bitField.name: CP14_CP15_pipeline_flush
bitField.description: Imposes a pipeline flush on CP14 and CP15 instructions that do not natively include one

bitField.name: Force_ETM_clock
bitField.description: Forces ETM clock enable active

bitField.name: Force_NEON_clock
bitField.description: Forces NEON clock enable active

bitField.name: Force_main_clock
bitField.description: Forces the main processor clock enable active

bitField.name: Force_NEON_single_issue
bitField.description: Forces single issue of Advanced SIMD instructions.

bitField.name: Force_load_store_single_issue
bitField.description: Forces single issue of load/store instructions

bitField.name: Force_single_issue
bitField.description: Forces single issue of all instructions

bitField.name: PLDNOP
bitField.description: Executes PLD instructions as a NOP instruction

bitField.name: WFINOP
bitField.description: Executes WFI instructions as a NOP instruction

bitField.name: Disable_branch_size_mispredicts
bitField.description: Prevents BTB branch size mispredicts

bitField.name: IBE
bitField.description: Invalidates BTB enable

bitField.name: L1NEON
bitField.description: Enables caching NEON data within the L1 data cache

bitField.name: ASA
bitField.description: Enables speculative accesses on AXI

bitField.name: L1PE
bitField.description: Enables L1 cache parity detection

bitField.name: L2EN_B
bitField.description: B Enables L2 cache

bitField.name: L1ALIAS
bitField.description: Enables L1 data cache hardware alias checks

register.name: CPACR
register.description: Sets access rights for the coprocessors CP0 through CP13

bitField.name: cp13
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP13 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp12
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP12 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp11
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP11 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp10
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP10 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp9
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP9 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp8
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP8 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp7
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP7 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp6
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP6 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp5
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP5 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp4
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP4 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp3
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP3 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp2
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP2 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp1
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP1 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp0
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP0 coprocessor.

register.name: SCR
register.description: Defines: -the current state of the processor as Secure or Non-secure states -in which state the core executes exceptions -the ability to modify the A and I bits in the CPSR in the Non-secure state

bitField.name: AW
bitField.description: Determines if the A bit in the CPSR can be modified when in the Non-secure state

bitField.name: FW
bitField.description: Determines if the F bit in the CPSR can be modified when in the Non-secure state

bitField.name: EA
bitField.description: Determines External Abort behavior for Secure and Non-secure states

bitField.name: FIQ
bitField.description: Determines FIQ behavior for Secure and Non-secure states

bitField.name: IRQ
bitField.description: Determines IRQ behavior for Secure and Non-secure states

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Defines the operation of the processor

register.name: SDER
register.description: Provide control of permissions for debug in secure User mode

bitField.name: SUNIDEN
bitField.description: Enables secure User non-invasive debug

bitField.name: SUIDEN
bitField.description: Enables secure User invasive debug

register.name: NSACR
register.description: Defines the non-secure access permission for: -coprocessors -internal PLE

bitField.name: PLE
bitField.description: Determines if an access to PLE registers is permitted in Non-secure state.

bitField.name: TL
bitField.description: Determines if lockable translation table entries can be allocated in Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CL
bitField.description: Determines if lockdown entries can be allocated within the L2 cache in Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP13
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP13 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP12
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP12 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP11
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP11 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP10
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP10 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP9
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP9 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP8
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP8 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP7
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP7 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP6
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP6 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP5
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP5 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP4
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP4 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP3
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP3 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP2
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP2 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP1
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP1 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP_0
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP0 in the Non-secure state.

register.name: VBAR
register.description: Holds the base address for exception vectors in the Secure and Non-secure states

register.name: ISR
register.description: Reflects the state of the nFIQ and nIRQ pins and the state of external aborts

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Indicates when an external abort is pending: 0 = no abort, reset value 1 = abort pending.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Indicates when an IRQ is pending: 0 = no IRQ, reset value 1 = IRQ pending.

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: Indicates when an FIQ is pending: 0 = no FIQ, reset value 1 = FIQ pending.

register.name: TLBTR
register.description: Returns the number of lockable entries for both the instruction and data TLBs

bitField.name: ILsize
bitField.description: Instruction lockable size specifies the number of instruction TLB lockable entries.

bitField.name: DLsize
bitField.description: Data lockable size specifies the number of unified or data TLB lockable entries.

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: Unified specifies if the TLB is unified or if there are separate instruction and data TLBs.

register.name: TTBR0
register.description: Holds the physical address of the first level translation table

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to non-shared or to shared memory

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is inner cacheable or inner non-cacheable

register.name: TTBR1
register.description: Holds the physical address of the first level table

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to non-shared or to shared memory

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is inner cacheable or inner non-cacheable

register.name: TTBCR
register.description: Determines if a translation table miss for a specific VA uses, for its translation table walk, TTBR0 or TTBR1

bitField.name: PD1
bitField.description: Specifies occurrence of a translation table walk on a TLB miss when using Translation Table Base Register 1. When translation table walk is disabled, a section translation fault occurs instead on a TLB miss.

bitField.name: PD0
bitField.description: Specifies occurrence of a translation table walk on a TLB miss when using Translation Table Base Register 0. When translation table walk is disabled, a section translation fault occurs instead on a TLB miss.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Specifies the boundary size of Translation Table Base Register 0.

register.name: DACR
register.description: Holds the access permissions for a maximum of 16 domains

bitField.name: D15
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D15

bitField.name: D14
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D14

bitField.name: D13
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D13

bitField.name: D12
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D12

bitField.name: D11
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D11

bitField.name: D10
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D10

bitField.name: D9
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D9

bitField.name: D8
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D8

bitField.name: D7
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D7

bitField.name: D6
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D6

bitField.name: D5
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D5

bitField.name: D4
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D4

bitField.name: D3
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D3

bitField.name: D2
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D2

bitField.name: D1
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D1

bitField.name: D0
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D0

register.name: DFSR
register.description: Holds the source of the last data fault

bitField.name: SD
bitField.description: Indicates whether an AXI Decode or Slave error caused an abort. This bit is only valid for external aborts. For all other aborts this bit Should-Be-Zero.

bitField.name: RW
bitField.description: Indicates whether a read or write access caused an abort.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Part of the Status field. See bits [3:0].

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Indicates which one of the 16 domains, D15-D0, is accessed when a data fault occurs. This field takes values 0-15.

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated. To determine the data fault, bits [12] and [10] must be used in conjunction with bits [3:0].

register.name: IFSR
register.description: Holds the source of the last instruction fault

bitField.name: SD
bitField.description: Indicates whether an AXI Decode or Slave error caused an abort. This bit is only valid for external aborts. For all other aborts this bit Should-Be-Zero.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Part of the Status field. See bits [3:0].

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated. To determine the data fault, bits [12] and [10] must be used in conjunction with bits [3:0].

register.name: ADFSR
register.description: Provided for compatibility with all ARMv7-A designs

register.name: AIFSR
register.description: Provided for compatibility with all ARMv7-A designs

register.name: DFAR
register.description: Holds the Modified Virtual Address of the fault when a precise abort occurs

register.name: IFAR
register.description: Holds the address of instructions that cause a prefetch abort

register.name: ITLBIALL
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB

register.name: ITLBIMVA
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB entry (MVA)

register.name: ITLBIASID
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB (ASID)

register.name: DTLBIALL
register.description: Invalidate Data-TLB

register.name: DTLBIMVA
register.description: Invalidate Data-TLB entry (MVA)

register.name: DTLBIASID
register.description: Invalidate Data-TLB (ASID)

register.name: TLBIALL
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB and Data-TLB

register.name: TLBIMVA
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB and Data-TLB entry (MVA)

register.name: TLBIASID
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB and Data-TLB (ASID)

register.name: PRRR
register.description: Primary region remap register

register.name: NMRR
register.description: Normal memory remap

register.name: DTLBLK
register.description: Data TLB lockdown

bitField.name: Base
bitField.description: Defines the offset from TLB entry 0 for which entries 0 to base - 1 are locked assuming P equals 1 during a hardware translation table walk.

bitField.name: Victim
bitField.description: Specifies the entry where the next hardware translation table walk can place a TLB entry. The reset value is 0. Each hardware translation table walk increments the value of the Victim field.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Determines if TLB entries allocated by subsequent translation table walks are not invalidated by the Invalidate TLB unlocked entries operation.

register.name: ITLBLK
register.description: Instruction TLB lockdown

bitField.name: Base
bitField.description: Defines the offset from TLB entry 0 for which entries 0 to base - 1 are locked assuming P equals 1 during a hardware translation table walk.

bitField.name: Victim
bitField.description: Specifies the entry where the next hardware translation table walk can place a TLB entry. The reset value is 0. Each hardware translation table walk increments the value of the Victim field.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Determines if TLB entries allocated by subsequent translation table walks are not invalidated by the Invalidate TLB unlocked entries operation.

register.name: DTLBPRL
register.description: Data TLB preload operation

register.name: ITLBPRL
register.description: Instruction TLB preload operation

register.name: PID
register.description: FCSE PID (deprecated)

bitField.name: FCSE_PID
bitField.description: Holds the ProcID. Identifies a specific process for fast context switch. The reset value is 0. The purpose of the FCSE PID Register is to provide the ProcID for fast context switch memory mappings. The MMU uses the contents of this register to map memory addresses in the range 0-32MB.

register.name: CID
register.description: Provides information on the current ASID and process ID, for example for the ETM and debug logic

bitField.name: PROCID
bitField.description: Extends the ASID to form the process ID and identifies the current process. The reset value is 0.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: Holds the ASID of the current process to identify the current ASID. The reset value is 0.

register.name: TPIDRURW
register.gui_name: user read/write Thread and Process ID
register.description: User read/write thread and process ID

register.name: TPIDRURO
register.gui_name: User read-only thread and process ID register
register.description: User read-only thread and process ID register

register.name: TPIDRPRW
register.gui_name: User privileged only thread and process ID
register.description: User privileged only thread and process ID

register.name: L2LK
register.description: L2 cache lockdown

bitField.name: LOCK_way_7
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 7 of the L2 cache.

bitField.name: LOCK_way_6
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 6 of the L2 cache.

bitField.name: LOCK_way_5
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 5 of the L2 cache.

bitField.name: LOCK_way_4
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 4 of the L2 cache.

bitField.name: LOCK_way_3
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 3 of the L2 cache.

bitField.name: LOCK_way_2
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 2 of the L2 cache.

bitField.name: LOCK_way_1
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 1 of the L2 cache.

bitField.name: LOCK_way_0
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 0 of the L2 cache.

register.name: L2ACTLR
register.description: L2 cache auxiliary control

bitField.name: L2_data_RAM_read_multiplexer_select
bitField.gui_name: L2 data RAM read multiplexer select
bitField.description: Configures the timing of the read data multiplexer select between one or two cycles for all L2 data RAM read operations.

bitField.name: ECC_or_Parity
bitField.description: Selects ECC or parity.

bitField.name: Load_data_forwarding_disable
bitField.description: Enables or disables load data forwarding to any LS or NEON request.

bitField.name: Write_combining_disable
bitField.description: Enables or disables write combining.

bitField.name: Write_allocate_delay_disable
bitField.description: Enables or disables external line-fill when storing an entire line with write allocate permission.

bitField.name: Write_allocate_combine_disable
bitField.description: Enables or disables combining of data in the L2 write combining buffers.

bitField.name: Write_allocate_disable
bitField.description: Enables or disables allocate on write miss in L2.

bitField.name: Parity_or_ECC_enable
bitField.description: Parity or ECC enable: 0 = disables parity or ECC, default 1 = enables parity or ECC.

bitField.name: L2_inner
bitField.description: Defines whether the L2 observes the inner or outer cacheability attributes.

bitField.name: Tag_RAM_latency
bitField.description: Program tag RAM latency.

bitField.name: Data_RAM_latency
bitField.description: Program data RAM latency.

register.name: CTR
register.description: Determines the instruction and data cache minimum line length in bytes to enable a range of addresses to be invalidated

bitField.name: Cache_writeback_granule
bitField.description: Log2 of the number of words of the maximum size of memory that can be overwritten as a result of the eviction of a cache entry that has ad a memory location within it modified.

bitField.name: DMinLine
bitField.description: Number of words of smallest line length in L1 or L2 data cache.

bitField.name: L1_Ipolicy
bitField.description: VIPT instruction cache support.

bitField.name: IMinLine
bitField.description: Number of words of smallest line length in L1 or L2 instruction cache.

register.name: CCSIDR
register.description: Provides cache size information for up to eight levels of cache containing instruction, data, or unified caches

bitField.name: WT
bitField.description: Indicates support available for write-through.

bitField.name: WB
bitField.description: Indicates support available for write-back.

bitField.name: RA
bitField.description: Indicates support available for read allocation.

bitField.name: WA
bitField.description: Indicates support available for write allocation.

bitField.name: NumSets
bitField.description: Indicates number of sets - 1.

bitField.name: Associativity
bitField.description: Indicates number of ways - 1.

bitField.name: LineSize
bitField.description: Indicates (log2(number of words in cache line)) - 2.

register.name: CSSELR
register.description: Holds the value that the processor uses to select the Cache Size Identification Register to use

bitField.name: Level
bitField.description: Cache level selected

bitField.name: IND
bitField.description: Instruction or Data/Unified.

register.name: CLIDR
register.description: indicate the cache levels that are implemented

bitField.name: LoU
bitField.description: Level of unification

bitField.name: LoC
bitField.description: Level of coherency

bitField.name: CL_8
bitField.description: Indicates cache at Cache Level (CL) 8

bitField.name: CL_7
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 7

bitField.name: CL_6
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 6

bitField.name: CL_5
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 5

bitField.name: CL_4
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 4

bitField.name: CL_3
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 3

bitField.name: CL_2
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 2

bitField.name: CL_1
bitField.description: Indicates separate instruction and data cache at CL 1

register.name: ICIALLU
register.gui_name: Invalidate all instruction caches to PoU
register.description: Invalidate all instruction caches to PoU

register.name: ICIMVAU
register.gui_name: Invalidate instruction cache line by MVA to PoC
register.description: Invalidate instruction cache line by MVA to PoC

bitField.name: Modified_virtual_address
bitField.description: Specifies address to invalidate, clean, or prefetch

register.name: PBFLSH
register.description: Prefetch buffer flush

register.name: BTCFLSH
register.description: Invalidate entire branch predictor array

register.name: BTCMVAFLSH
register.gui_name: Invalidate MVA from branch predictor array
register.description: Invalidate MVA from branch predictor array

bitField.name: Modified_virtual_address
bitField.description: Specifies address to invalidate, clean, or prefetch

register.name: DCIMVAC
register.gui_name: Invalidate Data or Unified cache line by MVA to PoC
register.description: Invalidate Data or Unified cache line by MVA to PoC

bitField.name: Modified_virtual_address
bitField.description: Specifies address to invalidate, clean, or prefetch

register.name: DCISW
register.gui_name: Invalidate Data or Unified cache line by Set/Way
register.description: Invalidate Data or Unified cache line by Set/Way

register.name: DCCMVAC
register.gui_name: Clean Data or Unified cache line by MVA to PoC
register.description: Clean Data or Unified cache line by MVA to PoC

register.name: DCCSW
register.gui_name: Clean Data or Unified cache line by Set/Way
register.description: Clean Data or Unified cache line by Set/Way

register.name: DCCMVAU
register.gui_name: Clean Data or Unified cache line by MVA to PoU
register.description: Clean Data or Unified cache line by MVA to PoU

bitField.name: Modified_virtual_address
bitField.description: Specifies address to invalidate, clean, or prefetch

register.name: DCCIMVAC
register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate Data or Unified cache line by MVA to PoC
register.description: Clean and Invalidate Data or Unified cache line by MVA to PoC

bitField.name: Modified_virtual_address
bitField.description: Specifies address to invalidate, clean, or prefetch

register.name: DCCISW
register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate Data or Unified cache line by Set/Way
register.description: Clean and Invalidate Data or Unified cache line by Set/Way

register_group.name: L2_Cache_PLE_Control
register_group.description: L2 Cache Preload Engine Control and Configuration

register.name: CHANNELS_PRESENT
register.gui_name: PLE Identification and Status Register present
register.description: PLE Identification and Status Register present

bitField.name: CH1
bitField.description: Provides information on PLE Channel 1 functions.

bitField.name: CH0
bitField.description: Provides information on PLE Channel 0 functions:.

register.name: CHANNELS_RUNNING
register.gui_name: PLE Identification and Status Register running
register.description: PLE Identification and Status Register running

bitField.name: CH1
bitField.description: Provides information on PLE Channel 1 functions.

bitField.name: CH0
bitField.description: Provides information on PLE Channel 0 functions:.

register.name: CHANNELS_INTERRUPTING
register.gui_name: PLE Identification and Status Register interrupting
register.description: PLE Identification and Status Register interrupting

bitField.name: CH1
bitField.description: Provides information on PLE Channel 1 functions.

bitField.name: CH0
bitField.description: Provides information on PLE Channel 0 functions.

register.name: CHANNELS_ACCESSIBILITY
register.description: Determines if a User mode process can access the registers for each channel

bitField.name: U1
bitField.description: Indicates if a User mode process can access the registers for channel 1.

bitField.name: U0
bitField.description: Indicates if a User mode process can access the registers for channel 0.

register.name: CHANNEL_NUMBER
register.description: Selects a PLE channel

bitField.name: CN
bitField.description: Indicates PLE channel selected.

register.name: CHANNEL_STOP
register.description: Stop PLE enable command

register.name: CHANNEL_START
register.description: Start PLE enable command

register.name: CHANNEL_CLEAR
register.description: Clear PLE enable command

register.name: CHANNEL_CONTROL
register.description: Controls the operations of the PLE channel

bitField.name: DT
bitField.description: Indicates direction of transfer.

bitField.name: IC
bitField.description: Indicates whether the PLE channel must assert an interrupt on completion of the PLE transfer, or if the Stop command stops the PLE.

bitField.name: IE
bitField.description: Indicates that the PLE channel must assert an interrupt on an error. The interrupt is deasserted from this source, when the channel is set to idle with a clear operation.

bitField.name: UM
bitField.description: Indicates that the permission checks are based on the PLE in User or privileged mode. The UM bit is provided so that the privileged mode process can emulate a User mode.

bitField.name: WY
bitField.description: Indicates the selected L2 cache way for filling data. This is used in conjunction with the L2 Cache Lockdown Register.

register.name: CHANNEL_INTERNALSTARTADDRESS
register.description: Defines the start address, that is, the first address that data transfers go to or from

register.name: CHANNEL_INTERNALENDADDRESS
register.description: Defines the number of cache lines transferred

register.name: CHANNEL_STATUS
register.description: Defines the status of the most recently started PLE operation on that channel

bitField.name: Error_code
bitField.description: Indicates the status of the external address error.

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the status of the PLE channel.

register.name: CHANNEL_CONTEXTID
register.description: Contains the processor context ID of the process that uses the channel

bitField.name: PROCID
bitField.description: Extends the ASID to form the process ID and identifies the current process

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: Holds the ASID of the current process and identifies the current ASID

register.name: PMCR
register.description: Controls the operation of the four Performance Monitor Count Registers, and the Cycle Counter Register

bitField.name: IMP
bitField.description: Specifies the implementor code.

bitField.name: IDCODE
bitField.description: Specifies the identification code.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Specifies the number of counters implemented.

bitField.name: DP
bitField.description: Disables cycle counter, CCNT, when non-invasive debug is prohibited.

bitField.name: X
bitField.description: Enables export of the events from the event bus to an external monitoring block, such as the ETM to trace events.

bitField.name: D
bitField.description: Cycle count divider: 0 = counts every processor clock cycle.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cycle counter reset: 0 = no action 1 = resets cycle counter, CCNT, to zero. This bit Read-As-Zero.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Performance counter reset: 0 = no action 1 = resets all performance counters to zero. This bit Read-As-Zero.

bitField.name: E
bitField.description: Enable bit: 0 = disables all counters, including CCNT 1 = enables all counters including CCNT.

register.name: PMCNTENSET
register.description: Enables or disables any of the Performance Monitor Count Registers

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Enable cycle counter.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Enable Counter 3.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Enable Counter 2.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Enable Counter 1.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Enable Counter 0.

register.name: PMCNTENCLR
register.description: Enables or disables any of the Performance Monitor Count Registers

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Disable cycle counter.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Disable Counter 3.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Disable Counter 2.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Disable Counter 1.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Disable Counter 0.

register.name: PMOVSR
register.description: Enables or disables any of the performance monitor counters producing an overflow flag

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cycle counter overflow flag.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Counter 3 overflow flag.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Counter 2 overflow flag.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Counter 1 overflow flag.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Counter 0 overflow flag.

register.name: SW_INC
register.description: Increments the count of a performance monitor count register

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Increment Counter 3

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Increment Counter 2

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Increment Counter 1

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Increment Counter 0

register.name: PMSELR
register.description: Selects a Performance Monitor Count Register

bitField.name: SEL
bitField.description: Counter select.

register.name: PMCCNTR
register.description: Counts the number of clock cycles since the register was reset

register.name: PMXEVTYPER
register.description: Selects the events that you want a Performance Monitor Count Register to count

bitField.name: SEL
bitField.description: Specifies the event selected.

register.name: PMXEVCNTR
register.description: Counts instances of an event selected by the EVTSEL Register

register.name: PMUSERENR
register.description: Enables User mode to have access to the Performance Monitor Registers

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: User mode enable

register.name: PMINTENSET
register.description: Determines if any of the Performance Monitor Count Registers generate an interrupt on overflow

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: CCNT overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: PMCNT3 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: PMCNT2 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: PMCNT1 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: PMCNT0 overflow interrupt enable.

register.name: PMINTENCLR
register.description: Determines if any of the Performance Monitor Count Registers generate an interrupt on overflow

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: CCNT overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: PMCNT3 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: PMCNT2 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: PMCNT1 overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: PMCNT0 overflow interrupt enable.

register_group.name: VA_TO_PA
register_group.description: Virtual Address to Physical Address Translation

register.name: PAR
register.description: Holds the Physical Address after a successful translation or the source of the abort for an unsuccessful translation

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Contains the physical address after a successful translation.

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Indicates the state of the NS attribute bit in the translation table.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Not used in the processor.

bitField.name: SH
bitField.description: Indicates shareable memory: 0 = non-shared 1 = shared.

bitField.name: INNER
bitField.description: Indicates the inner attributes from the translation table.

bitField.name: OUTER
bitField.description: Indicates the outer attributes from the translation table.

bitField.name: Supersection
bitField.description: Indicates if the result is a supersection.

bitField.name: FSR
bitField.description: Holds the FSR bits for the aborted address.

register.name: ATS1CPR
register.gui_name: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with privileged read permission
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with privileged read permission

register.name: ATS1CPW
register.gui_name: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with privileged write permission
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with privileged write permission

register.name: ATS1CUR
register.gui_name: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with User read permission
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with User read permission

register.name: ATS1CUW
register.gui_name: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with User write permission
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with User write permission

register.name: ATS12NSOPR
register.gui_name: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with privileged read permission
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with privileged read permission

register.name: ATS12NSOPW
register.gui_name: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with privileged write permission
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with privileged write permission

register.name: ATS12NSOUR
register.gui_name: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with User read permission
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with User read permission

register.name: ATS12NSOUW
register.gui_name: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with User write permission
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with User write permission

register.name: CP15DMB
register.description: Ensures that all outstanding explicit memory transactions complete before any following instructions begin

register.name: CP15DSB
register.description: Ensures that all outstanding explicit memory transactions complete before any following explicit memory transactions begin

register_group.name: TCM
register_group.description: Specifies that the processor does not implement instruction and data TCMs

register.name: TCMTR
register.description: TCM Type Register

register_group.name: Non_Secure
register_group.description: CP15 Registers that are banked in Non Secure Mode

register.name: N_CSSELR
register.description: Provides cache size information for up to eight levels of cache containing instruction, data, or unified caches

bitField.name: Level
bitField.description: Cache level selected

bitField.name: IND
bitField.description: Instruction or Data/Unified.

register.name: N_SCTLR
register.description: Provides control and configuration of: -memory alignment, endianness, protection, and fault behavior -MMU, cache enables, and cache replacement strategy -interrupts and behavior of interrupt latency -location for exception vectors -program flow prediction

bitField.name: TE
bitField.description: Thumb exception enable bit (banked).

bitField.name: AFE
bitField.description: This is the Access Flag Enable bit (banked).

bitField.name: TRE
bitField.description: This bit controls the TEX remap functionality in the MMU (banked).

bitField.name: NMFI
bitField.description: This is the Non-Maskable Fast Interrupt enable bit.

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: Determines the value of the CPSR E bit on an exception (banked).

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Determines the location of exception vectors (banked).

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Determines if instructions can be cached in any instruction cache at any cache level (banked).

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Enables program flow prediction (banked).

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Determines if data can be cached in a data or unified cache at any cache level (banked).

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Enables strict alignment of data to detect alignment faults in data accesses (banked).

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: Enables the MMU.

register.name: N_ACTLR
register.description: Controls processor-specific features that are not architecturally described

bitField.name: L2_hardware_reset_disable
bitField.description: Monitors the L2 hardware reset disable bit, L2RSTDISABLE

bitField.name: L1_hardware_reset_disable
bitField.description: Monitors the L1 hardware reset disable bit, L1RSTDISABLE

bitField.name: Cache_maintenance_pipeline
bitField.description: Specify pipelining of CP15 data cache maintenance operations

bitField.name: Clock_stop_request_disable
bitField.description: Disables Clock stop request

bitField.name: CP14_CP15_instruction_serialization
bitField.description: Imposes serialization on those CP14 and CP15 instructions that are not natively serialized

bitField.name: CP14_CP15_wait_on_idle
bitField.description: Imposes wait on idle protocol of CP14 and CP15 serialized instructions that do not natively wait on idle

bitField.name: CP14_CP15_pipeline_flush
bitField.description: Imposes a pipeline flush on CP14 and CP15 instructions that do not natively include one

bitField.name: Force_ETM_clock
bitField.description: Forces ETM clock enable active

bitField.name: Force_NEON_clock
bitField.description: Forces NEON clock enable active

bitField.name: Force_main_clock
bitField.description: Forces the main processor clock enable active

bitField.name: Force_NEON_single_issue
bitField.description: Forces single issue of Advanced SIMD instructions.

bitField.name: Force_load_store_single_issue
bitField.description: Forces single issue of load/store instructions

bitField.name: Force_single_issue
bitField.description: Forces single issue of all instructions

bitField.name: PLDNOP
bitField.description: Executes PLD instructions as a NOP instruction

bitField.name: WFINOP
bitField.description: Executes WFI instructions as a NOP instruction

bitField.name: Disable_branch_size_mispredicts
bitField.description: Prevents BTB branch size mispredicts

bitField.name: IBE
bitField.description: Invalidates BTB enable

bitField.name: L1NEON
bitField.description: Enables caching NEON data within the L1 data cache

bitField.name: ASA
bitField.description: Enables speculative accesses on AXI

bitField.name: L1PE
bitField.description: Enables L1 cache parity detection

bitField.name: L2EN_B
bitField.description: B Enables L2 cache

bitField.name: L1ALIAS
bitField.description: Enables L1 data cache hardware alias checks

register.name: N_TTBR0
register.description: Holds the physical address of the first level translation table

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to non-shared or to shared memory

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is inner cacheable or inner non-cacheable

register.name: N_TTBR1
register.description: Holds the physical address of the first level table

bitField.name: Translation_table_base_1
bitField.description: Holds the translation table base address, the physical address of the first level translation table

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to non-shared or to shared memory

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is inner cacheable or inner non-cacheable

register.name: N_TTBCR
register.description: Determines if a translation table miss for a specific VA uses, for its translation table walk, TTBR0 or TTBR1

bitField.name: PD1
bitField.description: Specifies occurrence of a translation table walk on a TLB miss when using Translation Table Base Register 1. When translation table walk is disabled, a section translation fault occurs instead on a TLB miss.

bitField.name: PD0
bitField.description: Specifies occurrence of a translation table walk on a TLB miss when using Translation Table Base Register 0. When translation table walk is disabled, a section translation fault occurs instead on a TLB miss.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Specifies the boundary size of Translation Table Base Register 0.

register.name: N_DACR
register.description: Holds the access permissions for a maximum of 16 domains

bitField.name: D15
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D15

bitField.name: D14
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D14

bitField.name: D13
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D13

bitField.name: D12
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D12

bitField.name: D11
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D11

bitField.name: D10
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D10

bitField.name: D9
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D9

bitField.name: D8
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D8

bitField.name: D7
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D7

bitField.name: D6
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D6

bitField.name: D5
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D5

bitField.name: D4
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D4

bitField.name: D3
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D3

bitField.name: D2
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D2

bitField.name: D1
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D1

bitField.name: D0
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D0

register.name: N_DFSR
register.description: Holds the source of the last data fault

bitField.name: SD
bitField.description: Indicates whether an AXI Decode or Slave error caused an abort. This bit is only valid for external aborts. For all other aborts this bit Should-Be-Zero.

bitField.name: RW
bitField.description: Indicates whether a read or write access caused an abort.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Part of the Status field. See bits [3:0].

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Indicates which one of the 16 domains, D15-D0, is accessed when a data fault occurs. This field takes values 0-15.

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated. To determine the data fault, bits [12] and [10] must be used in conjunction with bits [3:0].

register.name: N_IFSR
register.description: Holds the source of the last instruction fault

bitField.name: SD
bitField.description: Indicates whether an AXI Decode or Slave error caused an abort. This bit is only valid for external aborts. For all other aborts this bit Should-Be-Zero.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Part of the Status field. See bits [3:0].

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated. To determine the data fault, bits [12] and [10] must be used in conjunction with bits [3:0].

register.name: N_ADFSR
register.description: Provided for compatibility with all ARMv7-A designs

register.name: N_AIFSR
register.description: Provided for compatibility with all ARMv7-A designs

register.name: N_DFAR
register.description: Holds the Modified Virtual Address of the fault when a precise abort occurs

register.name: N_IFAR
register.description: Holds the address of instructions that cause a prefetch abort

register.name: N_ITLBIALL
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB

register.name: N_ITLBIMVA
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB entry (MVA)

register.name: N_ITLBIASID
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB (ASID)

register.name: N_DTLBIALL
register.description: Invalidate Data-TLB

register.name: N_DTLBIMVA
register.description: Invalidate Data-TLB entry (MVA)

register.name: N_DTLBIASID
register.description: Invalidate Data-TLB (ASID)

register.name: N_TLBIALL
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB and Data-TLB

register.name: N_TLBIMVA
register.gui_name: Non-secure Invalidate Inst-TLB and Data-TLB entry (MVA)
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB and Data-TLB entry (MVA)

register.name: N_TLBIASID
register.description: Invalidate Inst-TLB and Data-TLB (ASID)

register.name: N_PRRR
register.description: Primary region remap register

register.name: N_NMRR
register.description: Normal memory remap

register.name: N_VBAR
register.description: Holds the base address for exception vectors in the Secure and Non-secure states

register.name: N_PID
register.description: Use of the FCSE PID Register is deprecated

bitField.name: FCSE_PID
bitField.description: Holds the ProcID. Identifies a specific process for fast context switch. The reset value is 0. The purpose of the FCSE PID Register is to provide the ProcID for fast context switch memory mappings. The MMU uses the contents of this register to map memory addresses in the range 0-32MB.

register.name: N_CID
register.description: Provides information on the current ASID and process ID, for example for the ETM and debug logic

bitField.name: PROCID
bitField.description: Extends the ASID to form the process ID and identifies the current process. The reset value is 0.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: Holds the ASID of the current process to identify the current ASID. The reset value is 0.

register.name: N_TPIDRURW
register.gui_name: Non-secure User read/write thread and process ID
register.description: Non-secure User read/write thread and process ID

register.name: N_TPIDRURO
register.gui_name: Non-secure User read-only thread and process ID
register.description: Non-secure User read-only thread and process ID

register.name: N_TPIDRPRW
register.gui_name: Non-secure User privileged only thread and process ID
register.description: Non-secure User privileged only thread and process ID

register.name: N_PAR
register.description: Non-secure Physical Address

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Contains the physical address after a successful translation.

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Indicates the state of the NS attribute bit in the translation table.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Not used in the processor.

bitField.name: SH
bitField.description: Indicates shareable memory: 0 = non-shared 1 = shared.

bitField.name: INNER
bitField.description: Indicates the inner attributes from the translation table.

bitField.name: OUTER
bitField.description: Indicates the outer attributes from the translation table.

bitField.name: Supersection
bitField.description: Indicates if the result is a supersection.

bitField.name: FSR
bitField.description: Holds the FSR bits for the aborted address.
